wikitext.*:
'''KHEL''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "freeze". [[Christopher Tolkien]] has noted that this root and its derivatives were struck out by his father.<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 364 (root appearing as "KHEL-")</ref>
==Derivatives==
*[[Quenya]]: ''helle'' ("frost")<ref name=LR/>
*[[Noldorin]]: ''hell'' ("frost")<ref name=LR/>
==See also==
*[[KHELEK]] ("ice")
{{references}}
